Bash(git -C "D:\\Users\\ouser\\AndroidStudioProjects\\AESBuilder" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add optional MD5 sign feature and improve build pipeline

Add sign\(MD5\) as an optional feature controlled by config.json fields
sign_key and method_sign. When configured, the SO includes a sign\(\)
function that appends a key to input and returns its MD5 hex digest.
When omitted, build output is identical to before.

Key changes:
- New static files: md5.c/md5.h \(RFC 1321 MD5 implementation\)
- Templates updated with conditional sign placeholders
- build_so.py validates sign fields and generates code conditionally
- MainActivity.kt.tmpl added for test app generation
- Layout XML includes hidden sign card, shown when feature is enabled
- Documentation and usage guide updated

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C "D:\\Users\\ouser\\AndroidStudioProjects\\AESBuilder" add CLAUDE.md README.md "使用说明.md")
